the License at\n *\n *      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n *\n *  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n *  distributed under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n *  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n *  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and\n *  limitations under the License.\n ********************************************************************************/\n// THIS CODE WAS SECURITY REVIEWED BY KUDELSKI SECURITY, BUT NOT FORMALLY AUDITED\n\n// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\n\nimport \"@ensdomains/buffer/contracts/Buffer.sol\";\n\n/// @notice This library implement the leb128\n/// @author Zondax AG\nlibrary Leb128 {\n    using Buffer for Buffer.buffer;\n\n    /// @notice encode a unsigned integer 64bits into bytes\n    /// @param value the actor ID to encode\n    /// @return result return the value in bytes\n    function encodeUnsignedLeb128FromUInt64(uint64 value) internal pure returns (Buffer.buffer memory result) {\n        while (true) {\n            uint64 byte_ = value & 0x7f;\n            value >>= 7;\n            if (value == 0) {\n                result.appendUint8(uint8(byte_));\n                return result;\n            }\n            result.appendUint8(uint8(byte_ | 0x80));\n        }\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0xe1f4d71cdc933b0c2ac8eb81d711bf63457ed8e79b748ca9f826d40a3b4f143b","license":"Apache-2.0"},"@zondax/filecoin-solidity/contracts/v0.8/utils/Misc.sol":{"content":"/*******************************************************************************\n *   (c) 2022 Zondax AG\n *\n *  Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n *  you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.\n *  You may obtain a copy of the License at\n *\n *      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n *\n *  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n *  distributed under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n *  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n *  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and\n *  limitations under the License.\n ********************************************************************************/\n// THIS CODE WAS SECURITY REVIEWED BY KUDELSKI SECURITY, BUT NOT FORMALLY AUDITED\n\n// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\n\nimport \"../types/CommonTypes.sol\";\n\n/// @title Library containing miscellaneous functions used on the project\n/// @author Zondax AG\nlibrary Misc {\n    uint64 constant DAG_CBOR_CODEC = 0x71;\n    uint64 constant CBOR_CODEC = 0x51;\n    uint64 constant NONE_CODEC = 0x00;\n\n    // Code taken from Openzeppelin repo\n    // Link: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/0320a718e8e07b1d932f5acb8ad9cec9d9eed99b/contracts/utils/math/SignedMath.sol#L37-L42\n    /// @notice get the abs from a signed number\n    /// @param n number to get abs from\n    /// @return unsigned number\n    function abs(int256 n) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        unchecked {\n            // must be unchecked in order to support `n = type(int256).min`\n            return uint256(n >= 0 ? n : -n);\n        }\n    }\n\n    /// @notice validate if an address exists or not\n    /// @dev read this article for more information https://blog.finxter.com/how-to-find-out-if-an-ethereum-address-is-a-contract/\n    /// @param addr address to check\n    /// @return whether the address exists or not\n    function addressExists(address addr) internal view returns (bool) {\n        bytes32 codehash;\n        assembly {\n            codehash := extcodehash(addr)\n        }\n        return codehash != 0x0;\n    }\n\n    /// Returns the data size required by CBOR.writeFixedNumeric\n    function getPrefixSize(uint256 data_size) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        if (data_size <= 23) {\n            return 1;\n        } else if (data_size <= 0xFF) {\n            return 2;\n        } else if (data_size <= 0xFFFF) {\n            return 3;\n        } else if (data_size <= 0xFFFFFFFF) {\n            return 5;\n        }\n        return 9;\n    }\n\n    function getBytesSize(bytes memory value) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        return getPrefixSize(value.length) + value.length;\n    }\n\n    function getCidSize(bytes memory value) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        return getPrefixSize(2) + value.length;\n    }\n\n    function getFilActorIdSize(CommonTypes.FilActorId value) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        uint64 val = CommonTypes.FilActorId.unwrap(value);\n        return getPrefixSize(uint256(val));\n    }\n\n    function getChainEpochSize(CommonTypes.ChainEpoch value) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        int64 val = CommonTypes.ChainEpoch.unwrap(value);\n        if (val >= 0) {\n            return getPrefixSize(uint256(uint64(val)));\n        } else {\n            return getPrefixSize(uint256(uint64(-1 - val)));\n        }\n    }\n\n    function getBoolSize() internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        return getPrefixSize(1);\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x97b02c3ab9cb11169b0b1a143b513017c6bf0f2cba2fc4f81a77345b5dfe96b4","license":"Apache-2.0"},"contracts/ClientRegistry.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\n\r\nimport {ClientTypes} from \"./types/ClientTypes.sol\";\r\nimport {MinerAPI, MinerTypes, CommonTypes} from \"@zondax/filecoin-solidity/contracts/v0.8/MinerAPI.sol\";\r\nimport {SubsidyDao} from \"./SubsidyDao.sol\";\r\nimport {AccessControl} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/AccessControl.sol\";\r\n\r\ncontract ClientRegistry is AccessControl {\r\n    // apply\r\n    // verified\r\n    // blacklisted\r\n\r\n    // Mapping of client miner ids to their Client info\r\n    mapping(uint64 => ClientTypes.Client) public clients;\r\n\r\n    // Mapping of client actor ids to their allocation\r\n    mapping(uint64 => ClientTypes.ClientAllocation) public allocations;\r\n\r\n    // mapping of client actor ids to their allocation requests\r\n    mapping(uint64 => ClientTypes.AllocationRequest) public allocationRequests;\r\n\r\n    // mapping of liquid staking pools to its addresses\r\n    mapping(address => bool) public pools;\r\n\r\n    // mapping of client ethereum address to client actor id\r\n    mapping(address => uint64) public clientAddressToId;\r\n\r\n    mapping(uint64 => bool) public whitelistedClients;\r\n\r\n    uint64[] public clientsList;\r\n\r\n    uint256 public whitelistedCount;\r\n\r\n    uint256 allocationLimit = 10000;\r\n\r\n    SubsidyDao subsidyDao;\r\n\r\n    constructor() {\r\n        _grantRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE, msg.sender);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setSubsidyDao(address _subsidyDaoAddress) public onlyRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE) {\r\n        subsidyDao = SubsidyDao(_subsidyDaoAddress);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function register(uint64 _clientId, string memory name) public {\r\n        ClientTypes.Client storage client = clients[_clientId];\r\n        // client.verificationFormCID = _verificationFormCID;\r\n        client.ethAddress = msg.sender;\r\n        client.name = name;\r\n        clientAddressToId[msg.sender] = _clientId;\r\n        // TODO: accept deposit\r\n        clientsList.push(_clientId);\r\n        // TODO: add whitelist request to dao\r\n        subsidyDao.createClientWhitelistRequest(_clientId, msg.sender);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function whitelist(uint64 _clientId) public {\r\n        ClientTypes.Client storage client = clients[_clientId];\r\n        client.verified = true;\r\n        ClientTypes.ClientAllocation storage allocation = allocations[_clientId];\r\n        allocation.allocationLimit = allocationLimit;\r\n        allocation.allocation = 0;\r\n        whitelistedCount++;\r\n        whitelistedClients[_clientId] = true;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function allocateSubsidyToClient(uint64 _clientId, uint256 _newAllocation) public {\r\n        ClientTypes.ClientAllocation storage allocation = allocations[_clientId];\r\n        require(_newAllocation < allocation.allocationLimit, \"allocation exceeds limit\");\r\n        allocation.allocation = _newAllocation;\r\n        // TODO: Generate tokens and give to client\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function doesClientHaveAllocation(uint64 _clientId) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        return allocations[_clientId].allocation > 0;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getClientAllocation(uint64 _clientId) public view returns (uint256) {\r\n        return allocations[_clientId].allocation;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getClientAllocationByAddress(address _clientAddress) public view returns (uint256) {\r\n        return allocations[clientAddressToId[_clientAddress]].allocation;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function blacklist(uint64 _clientId) public {\r\n        ClientTypes.Client storage client = clients[_clientId];\r\n        client.blacklisted = true;\r\n        whitelistedCount--;\r\n        whitelistedClients[_clientId] = false;\r\n        // TODO: take back all tokens\r\n        // TODO: put deposit in vault\r\n        // TODO: client.verif\r\n        // DO NOT ACCEPT SUBSIDY\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function isClientIdRegistered(uint64 _clientId) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        return clients[_clientId].ethAddress != address(0);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function isClientAddressRegistered(address _clientAddress) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        return clientAddressToId[_clientAddress] != 0;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function isWhitelisted(uint64 _clientId) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        return clients[_clientId].verified;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function isAddressWhitelisted(address _clientAddress) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        return clients[clientAddressToId[_clientAddress]].verified;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getEthAddress(uint64 _clientId) public view returns (address) {\r\n        return clients[_clientId].ethAddress;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getClientId(address _clientAddress) public view returns (uint64) {\r\n        return clientAddressToId[_clientAddress];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getWhitelistedClients() public view returns (uint64[] memory) {\r\n        uint64[] memory whitelisted = new uint64[](whitelistedCount);\r\n        uint64 count = 0;\r\n        for (uint64 i = 0; i < clientsList.length; i++) {\r\n            if (whitelistedClients[clientsList[i]]) {\r\n                whitelisted[count] = clientsList[i];\r\n                count++;\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        return whitelisted;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getAllClients() public view returns (ClientTypes.Client[] memory) {\r\n        ClientTypes.Client[] memory allClients = new ClientTypes.Client[](clientsList.length);\r\n        for (uint64 i = 0; i < clientsList.length; i++) {\r\n            allClients[i] = clients[clientsList[i]];\r\n        }\r\n        return allClients;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getClientByAddress(\r\n        address _clientAddress\r\n    ) public view returns (ClientTypes.Client memory) {\r\n        return clients[clientAddressToId[_clientAddress]];\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x4091e2565212195fc2d9506305f13816d9044081f571ef70571c1d59c72aae6a","license":"MIT"},"contracts/ClientSubsidyToken.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\n\r\nimport {ERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol\";\r\nimport {ERC20Burnable} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/ERC20Burnable.sol\";\r\nimport {AccessControl} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/AccessControl.sol\";\r\n\r\n/// @custom:security-contact hfccr@outlook.com\r\ncontract ClientSubsidyToken is ERC20, ERC20Burnable, AccessControl {\r\n    // Should be an ERC20 token\r\n    // Cannot be transferred\r\n    // Can be redeemed against subsidy for storage deals by providers\r\n    // Anyone can call redeem function\r\n    // Redeem function will transfer money in the deal to a whitelisted provider\r\n    // from the vault of the pool\r\n\r\n    bytes32 public constant MINTER_ROLE = keccak256(\"MINTER_ROLE\");\r\n    bytes32 public constant BURNER_ROLE = keccak256(\"BURNER_ROLE\");\r\n\r\n    constructor(address defaultAdmin, address minter) ERC20(\"Client Subsidy Token\", \"CST\") {\r\n        _grantRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE, defaultAdmin);\r\n        _grantRole(MINTER_ROLE, minter);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function mint(address to, uint256 amount) public onlyRole(MINTER_ROLE) {\r\n        _mint(to, amount);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function burn() public onlyRole(BURNER_ROLE) {\r\n        _burn(msg.sender, balanceOf(msg.sender));\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function transfer(address recipient, uint256 amount) public override returns (bool) {\r\n        revert(\"Cannot transfer CST\");\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function transferFrom(\r\n        address sender,\r\n        address recipient,\r\n        uint256 amount\r\n    ) public override returns (bool) {\r\n        revert(\"Cannot transfer CST\");\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x5781df5d418d66bea44f93482c3047fafa4ad065482c32f980c88c587a0b8e2f","license":"MIT"},"contracts/LiquidStaking.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\n\r\nimport {IWFIL} from \"./libraries/tokens/IWFIL.sol\";\r\nimport {Initializable} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/proxy/utils/Initializable.sol\";\r\nimport {ReentrancyGuard} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol\";\r\nimport {AccessControl} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/AccessControl.sol\";\r\nimport {ERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol\";\r\nimport {IERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol\";\r\nimport {Math} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol\";\r\nimport {SafeTransferLib} from \"./libraries/SafeTransferLib.sol\";\r\nimport {ERC4626} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/ERC4626.sol\";\r\nimport {MarketAPI} from \"@zondax/filecoin-solidity/contracts/v0.8/MarketAPI.sol\";\r\nimport {MarketTypes} from \"@zondax/filecoin-solidity/contracts/v0.8/types/MarketTypes.sol\";\r\nimport {CommonTypes} from \"@zondax/filecoin-solidity/contracts/v0.8/types/CommonTypes.sol\";\r\nimport {StorageProviderRegistry} from \"./StorageProviderRegistry.sol\";\r\nimport {ClientRegistry} from \"./ClientRegistry.sol\";\r\nimport {ClientSubsidyToken} from \"./ClientSubsidyToken.sol\";\r\nimport {RetrievalRoyalty} from \"./RetrievalRoyalty.sol\";\r\n\r\ncontract LiquidStaking is ERC4626, ReentrancyGuard, AccessControl {\r\n    IWFIL public WFIL; // WFIL implementation\r\n\r\n    error InvalidAccess();\r\n    error ERC4626ZeroShares();\r\n    error InactiveActor();\r\n    error InsufficientFunds();\r\n    error InvalidOwner();\r\n    error ERC4626Overflow();\r\n    error ERC4626Underflow();\r\n    error AllowanceUnderflow();\r\n    error InvalidParams();\r\n\r\n    uint256 liquidityCap = 10000;\r\n    address WFIL_ADDRESS = 0xaC26a4Ab9cF2A8c5DBaB6fb4351ec0F4b07356c4;\r\n    mapping(address => uint256) public subsidyBalance;\r\n    uint256 totalSubsidyBalance;\r\n    mapping(uint64 => bool) public dealsSubsidized;\r\n\r\n    StorageProviderRegistry storageProviderRegistry;\r\n    ClientRegistry clientRegistry;\r\n    RetrievalRoyalty retrievalRoyalty;\r\n\r\n    constructor() ERC4626(IWFIL(WFIL_ADDRESS)) ERC20(\"Royalty FIL\", \"RRBFIL\") {\r\n        WFIL = IWFIL(WFIL_ADDRESS);\r\n        _grantRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE, msg.sender);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setStorageProviderRegistry(\r\n        address _storageProviderRegistry\r\n    ) public onlyRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE) {\r\n        storageProviderRegistry = StorageProviderRegistry(_storageProviderRegistry);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setClientRegistry(address _clientRegistry) public onlyRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE) {\r\n        clientRegistry = ClientRegistry(_clientRegistry);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setRetrievalRoyalty(address _retrievalRoyalty) public onlyRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE) {\r\n        retrievalRoyalty = RetrievalRoyalty(_retrievalRoyalty);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    receive() external payable virtual {}\r\n\r\n    fallback() external payable virtual {}\r\n\r\n    function pledge(address clientEthAddress, uint256 amount) public {\r\n        if (amount > totalFilAvailable()) revert InvalidParams();\r\n        subsidyBalance[clientEthAddress] += amount;\r\n        totalSubsidyBalance += amount;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function stake() external payable nonReentrant returns (uint256 shares) {\r\n        uint256 assets = msg.value;\r\n        address receiver = msg.sender;\r\n\r\n        if (assets > maxDeposit(receiver)) revert ERC4626Overflow();\r\n        shares = previewDeposit(assets);\r\n\r\n        if (shares == 0) revert ERC4626ZeroShares();\r\n\r\n        WFIL.deposit{value: assets}();\r\n\r\n        _mint(receiver, shares);\r\n        emit Deposit(_msgSender(), receiver, assets, shares);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function claimSubsidyOnDeal(uint64 _dealId, address clientEthAddress) public {\r\n        require(!dealsSubsidized[_dealId], \"Deal already subsidized\");\r\n        // uint64 client = MarketAPI.getDealClient(_dealId);\r\n        // uint64 provider = MarketAPI.getDealProvider(_dealId);\r\n        // require(storageProviderRegistry.isWhitelisted(provider), \"Provider not whitelisted\");\r\n        // require(clientRegistry.isWhitelisted(client), \"Client not whitelisted\");\r\n        // address clientEthAddress = clientRegistry.getEthAddress(client);\r\n        require(\r\n            subsidyBalance[clientEthAddress] > 1,\r\n            \"Client does not have enough subsidy tokens to cover this deal\"\r\n        );\r\n        // TODO calculate subsidy\r\n        // TODO require vault balance\r\n        // TODO remove from vault and give to storage provider\r\n        // Add royalty\r\n        retrievalRoyalty.addRoyalty(_dealId, 10, address(this));\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function unstake(uint256 shares, address owner) external nonReentrant returns (uint256 assets) {\r\n        if (shares > maxRedeem(owner)) revert ERC4626Overflow();\r\n\r\n        address receiver = msg.sender;\r\n        // owner = owner.normalize();\r\n\r\n        assets = previewRedeem(shares);\r\n\r\n        if (receiver != owner) {\r\n            _spendAllowance(owner, receiver, shares);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        _burn(owner, shares);\r\n\r\n        // emit Unstaked(msg.sender, owner, assets, shares);\r\n\r\n        _unwrapWFIL(payable(receiver), assets);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // TODO: send money to clients\r\n    function pledge(address clientAddress) public {}\r\n\r\n    function totalAssets() public view virtual override returns (uint256) {\r\n        // TODO: add the value of subsidy tokens issued to the clients\r\n        return totalFilAvailable() - totalSubsidyBalance;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function totalFilAvailable() public view returns (uint256) {\r\n        return WFIL.balanceOf(address(this)) - totalSubsidyBalance;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function _unwrapWFIL(address payable _recipient, uint256 _amount) internal {\r\n        uint256 balanceWETH9 = WFIL.balanceOf(address(this));\r\n        if (balanceWETH9 < _amount) revert InsufficientFunds();\r\n\r\n        if (balanceWETH9 > 0) {\r\n            WFIL.withdraw(_amount);\r\n            _recipient.transfer(_amount);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function maxDeposit(address) public view virtual override returns (uint256) {\r\n        return liquidityCap - totalFilAvailable();\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function maxMint(address) public view virtual override returns (uint256) {\r\n        return liquidityCap - totalFilAvailable();\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function maxWithdraw(address owner) public view virtual override returns (uint256) {\r\n        return _convertToAssets(balanceOf(owner), Math.Rounding.Floor);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function maxRedeem(address owner) public view virtual override returns (uint256) {\r\n        return balanceOf(owner);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getSubsidyBalance(address clientEthAddress) public view returns (uint256) {\r\n        return subsidyBalance[clientEthAddress];\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x205242bdc0b2c68f7706674e0a830d74f0f2e0288b17bda7f39902aac6c4e1fa","license":"MIT"},"contracts/RetrievalRoyalty.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\n\r\nimport {RetrievalRoyaltyTypes} from \"./types/RetrievalRoyaltyTypes.sol\";\r\nimport {AccessControl} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/AccessControl.sol\";\r\n\r\ncontract RetrievalRoyalty is AccessControl {\r\n    mapping(uint64 => RetrievalRoyaltyTypes.RetrievalRoyalty) public retrievalRoyaltiesForDeal;\r\n    uint256 public royaltyCount;\r\n    bytes32 public constant SUBSIDY_PROVIDER = keccak256(\"SUBSIDY_PROVIDER\");\r\n\r\n    constructor() {\r\n        _grantRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE, msg.sender);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // Create a royalty post subsidy\r\n    function addRoyalty(\r\n        uint64 _dealId,\r\n        uint256 _commissionPercentage,\r\n        address _beneficiary\r\n    ) public {\r\n        RetrievalRoyaltyTypes.RetrievalRoyalty storage royalty = retrievalRoyaltiesForDeal[_dealId];\r\n        royalty.dealId = _dealId;\r\n        royalty.commissionPercentage = _commissionPercentage;\r\n        royalty.beneficiary = _beneficiary;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getRoyalty(\r\n        uint64 _dealId\r\n    ) public view returns (RetrievalRoyaltyTypes.RetrievalRoyalty memory) {\r\n        return retrievalRoyaltiesForDeal[_dealId];\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x51eff731f3735dbfccc15ba467f2d66637ed63a6c53c337520164259ec0aead0","license":"MIT"},"contracts/StorageProviderRegistry.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\n\r\nimport {StorageProviderTypes} from \"./types/StorageProviderTypes.sol\";\r\nimport {MinerAPI, MinerTypes, CommonTypes} from \"@zondax/filecoin-solidity/contracts/v0.8/MinerAPI.sol\";\r\nimport {AccessControl} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/AccessControl.sol\";\r\nimport {SubsidyDao} from \"./SubsidyDao.sol\";\r\n\r\ncontract StorageProviderRegistry is AccessControl {\r\n    mapping(uint64 => StorageProviderTypes.StorageProvider) public storageProviders;\r\n    mapping(uint64 => StorageProviderTypes.StorageProviderSubsidy) public subsidies;\r\n\r\n    mapping(address => uint64) public storageProviderAddressToId;\r\n    mapping(uint64 => bool) public whitelistedStorageProviders;\r\n    uint64[] public storageProvidersList;\r\n    uint256 public whitelistedCount;\r\n    SubsidyDao subsidyDao;\r\n\r\n    constructor() {\r\n        _grantRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE, msg.sender);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setSubsidyDao(address _subsidyDaoAddress) public onlyRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE) {\r\n        subsidyDao = SubsidyDao(_subsidyDaoAddress);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function register(uint64 _storageProviderId) public {\r\n        StorageProviderTypes.StorageProvider storage storageProvider = storageProviders[\r\n            _storageProviderId\r\n        ];\r\n        storageProvider.ethAddress = msg.sender;\r\n        storageProviderAddressToId[msg.sender] = _storageProviderId;\r\n        // TODO: accept deposit\r\n        storageProvidersList.push(_storageProviderId);\r\n        subsidyDao.createStorageProviderWhitelistRequest(_storageProviderId);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function whitelist(uint64 _storageProviderId) public {\r\n        StorageProviderTypes.StorageProvider storage storageProvider = storageProviders[\r\n            _storageProviderId\r\n        ];\r\n        storageProvider.verified = true;\r\n        StorageProviderTypes.StorageProviderSubsidy storage subsidy = subsidies[_storageProviderId];\r\n        subsidy.numberOfDealsRedeemed = 0;\r\n        whitelistedStorageProviders[_storageProviderId] = true;\r\n        whitelistedCount++;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function blacklist(uint64 _storageProviderId) public {\r\n        StorageProviderTypes.StorageProvider storage storageProvider = storageProviders[\r\n            _storageProviderId\r\n        ];\r\n        storageProvider.blacklisted = true;\r\n        whitelistedStorageProviders[_storageProviderId] = false;\r\n        whitelistedCount--;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function isStorageProviderRegistered(uint64 _storageProviderId) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        return storageProviders[_storageProviderId].ethAddress != address(0);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function isStorageProviderAddressRegistered(\r\n        address _storageProviderAddress\r\n    ) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        return storageProviderAddressToId[_storageProviderAddress] != 0;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getEthAddress(uint64 _storageProviderId) public view returns (address) {\r\n        return storageProviders[_storageProviderId].ethAddress;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function isWhitelisted(uint64 _storageProviderId) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        return whitelistedStorageProviders[_storageProviderId];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function isAddressWhitelisted(address _storageProviderAddress) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        uint64 storageProviderId = storageProviderAddressToId[_storageProviderAddress];\r\n        return whitelistedStorageProviders[storageProviderId];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getWhitelistedStorageProviders() public view returns (uint64[] memory) {\r\n        uint64[] memory whitelisted = new uint64[](whitelistedCount);\r\n        uint64 count = 0;\r\n        for (uint64 i = 0; i < storageProvidersList.length; i++) {\r\n            if (whitelistedStorageProviders[storageProvidersList[i]]) {\r\n                whitelisted[count] = storageProvidersList[i];\r\n                count++;\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        return whitelisted;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getAllStorageProviders()\r\n        public\r\n        view\r\n        returns (StorageProviderTypes.StorageProvider[] memory)\r\n    {\r\n        StorageProviderTypes.StorageProvider[]\r\n            memory allStorageProviders = new StorageProviderTypes.StorageProvider[](\r\n                storageProvidersList.length\r\n            );\r\n        for (uint64 i = 0; i < storageProvidersList.length; i++) {\r\n            allStorageProviders[i] = storageProviders[storageProvidersList[i]];\r\n        }\r\n        return allStorageProviders;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getStorageProviderByAddress(\r\n        address _storageProviderAddress\r\n    ) public view returns (StorageProviderTypes.StorageProvider memory) {\r\n        uint64 storageProviderId = storageProviderAddressToId[_storageProviderAddress];\r\n        return storageProviders[storageProviderId];\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x21d36dd308cebc6ef07f7cbf23bad830277aba26bc5e545fe6213d658d794b98","license":"MIT"},"contracts/SubsidyDao.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\nimport {SubsidyDaoTypes} from \"./types/SubsidyDaoTypes.sol\";\r\nimport {ClientRegistry} from \"./ClientRegistry.sol\";\r\nimport {StorageProviderRegistry} from \"./StorageProviderRegistry.sol\";\r\nimport {AccessControl} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/AccessControl.sol\";\r\n\r\ncontract SubsidyDao is AccessControl {\r\n    ClientRegistry clientRegistry;\r\n    StorageProviderRegistry storageProviderRegistry;\r\n    // store a queue of client whitelists\r\n    uint256 public clientWhitelistRequestCount;\r\n    mapping(uint256 => SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientWhitelistRequest) clientWhitelistRequestMap;\r\n\r\n    uint256 public clientAllocationRequestCount;\r\n    mapping(uint256 => SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientAllocationRequest) clientAllocationRequestMap;\r\n\r\n    uint256 public storageProviderWhitelistRequestCount;\r\n    mapping(uint256 => SubsidyDaoTypes.StorageProviderWhitelistRequest) storageProviderWhitelistRequestMap;\r\n\r\n    constructor() {\r\n        _grantRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE, msg.sender);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setClientRegistry(address _clientRegistryAddress) public onlyRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE) {\r\n        clientRegistry = ClientRegistry(_clientRegistryAddress);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setStorageProviderRegistry(\r\n        address _storageProviderRegistryAddress\r\n    ) public onlyRole(DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE) {\r\n        storageProviderRegistry = StorageProviderRegistry(_storageProviderRegistryAddress);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function createClientWhitelistRequest(uint64 _clientId, address ethAddress) public {\r\n        // Client must be registered before whitelist\r\n        // require(clientRegistry.isClientIdRegistered(_clientId), \"Client not registered\");\r\n        SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientWhitelistRequest storage request = clientWhitelistRequestMap[\r\n            clientWhitelistRequestCount\r\n        ];\r\n        request.clientId = _clientId;\r\n        request.approved = false;\r\n        request.ethAddress = ethAddress;\r\n        clientWhitelistRequestCount++;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function approveClientWhitelistRequest(uint256 _requestIndex) public {\r\n        // Client must not be already whitelisted\r\n        require(\r\n            clientRegistry.isWhitelisted(clientWhitelistRequestMap[_requestIndex].clientId) ==\r\n                false,\r\n            \"Client already whitelisted\"\r\n        );\r\n        require(\r\n            clientWhitelistRequestMap[_requestIndex].approved == false,\r\n            \"Request already approved\"\r\n        );\r\n        // Call client registry with request params\r\n        clientRegistry.whitelist(clientWhitelistRequestMap[_requestIndex].clientId);\r\n        clientWhitelistRequestMap[_requestIndex].approved = true;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function createStorageProviderWhitelistRequest(uint64 _storageProviderId) public {\r\n        // storage provider must be registered before whitelisting\r\n        // require(\r\n        //     storageProviderRegistry.isStorageProviderRegistered(_storageProviderId),\r\n        //     \"Storage provider not registered\"\r\n        // );\r\n        SubsidyDaoTypes.StorageProviderWhitelistRequest\r\n            storage request = storageProviderWhitelistRequestMap[\r\n                storageProviderWhitelistRequestCount\r\n            ];\r\n        request.storageProviderId = _storageProviderId;\r\n        request.approved = false;\r\n        request.ethAddress = storageProviderRegistry.getEthAddress(_storageProviderId);\r\n        storageProviderWhitelistRequestCount++;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function approveStorageProviderWhitelistRequest(uint256 _requestIndex) public {\r\n        // storage provider must not be already whitelisted\r\n        require(\r\n            storageProviderRegistry.isWhitelisted(\r\n                storageProviderWhitelistRequestMap[_requestIndex].storageProviderId\r\n            ) == false,\r\n            \"Storage provider already whitelisted\"\r\n        );\r\n        require(\r\n            storageProviderWhitelistRequestMap[_requestIndex].approved == false,\r\n            \"Request already approved\"\r\n        );\r\n        // Call client registry with request params\r\n        storageProviderRegistry.whitelist(\r\n            storageProviderWhitelistRequestMap[_requestIndex].storageProviderId\r\n        );\r\n        storageProviderWhitelistRequestMap[_requestIndex].approved = true;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function createClientAllocationRequest(uint64 _clientId, uint256 _allocation) public {\r\n        // Client must be whitelisted\r\n        require(clientRegistry.isWhitelisted(_clientId), \"Client not whitelisted\");\r\n        SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientAllocationRequest storage request = clientAllocationRequestMap[\r\n            clientAllocationRequestCount\r\n        ];\r\n        request.clientId = _clientId;\r\n        request.allocation = _allocation;\r\n        request.approved = false;\r\n        request.ethAddress = clientRegistry.getEthAddress(_clientId);\r\n        clientAllocationRequestCount++;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function createClientAllocationRequestByAddress(\r\n        address _clientAddress,\r\n        uint256 _allocation\r\n    ) public {\r\n        // Client must be whitelisted\r\n        require(clientRegistry.isAddressWhitelisted(_clientAddress), \"Client not whitelisted\");\r\n        SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientAllocationRequest storage request = clientAllocationRequestMap[\r\n            clientAllocationRequestCount\r\n        ];\r\n        request.clientId = clientRegistry.getClientId(_clientAddress);\r\n        request.allocation = _allocation;\r\n        request.approved = false;\r\n        request.ethAddress = _clientAddress;\r\n        clientAllocationRequestCount++;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function approveClientAllocationRequest(uint256 _requestIndex) public {\r\n        // Client must be whitelisted\r\n        require(\r\n            clientRegistry.isWhitelisted(clientAllocationRequestMap[_requestIndex].clientId),\r\n            \"Client not whitelisted\"\r\n        );\r\n        require(\r\n            clientAllocationRequestMap[_requestIndex].approved == false,\r\n            \"Request already approved\"\r\n        );\r\n        // Call client registry with request params\r\n        clientRegistry.allocateSubsidyToClient(\r\n            clientAllocationRequestMap[_requestIndex].clientId,\r\n            clientAllocationRequestMap[_requestIndex].allocation\r\n        );\r\n        clientAllocationRequestMap[_requestIndex].approved = true;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getClientWhitelistRequests()\r\n        public\r\n        view\r\n        returns (SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientWhitelistRequest[] memory)\r\n    {\r\n        SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientWhitelistRequest[]\r\n            memory requests = new SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientWhitelistRequest[](\r\n                clientWhitelistRequestCount\r\n            );\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < clientWhitelistRequestCount; i++) {\r\n            requests[i] = clientWhitelistRequestMap[i];\r\n        }\r\n        return requests;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function doesClientHaveAllocationRequest(address ethAddress) public view returns (bool) {\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < clientAllocationRequestCount; i++) {\r\n            if (clientAllocationRequestMap[i].clientId == clientRegistry.getClientId(ethAddress)) {\r\n                return true;\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        return false;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getClientAllocationRequestForClient(\r\n        uint64 _clientId\r\n    ) public view returns (SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientAllocationRequest memory) {\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < clientAllocationRequestCount; i++) {\r\n            if (clientAllocationRequestMap[i].clientId == _clientId) {\r\n                return clientAllocationRequestMap[i];\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        revert(\"No allocation request found for client\");\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getClientAllocationRequests()\r\n        public\r\n        view\r\n        returns (SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientAllocationRequest[] memory)\r\n    {\r\n        SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientAllocationRequest[]\r\n            memory requests = new SubsidyDaoTypes.ClientAllocationRequest[](\r\n                clientAllocationRequestCount\r\n            );\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < clientAllocationRequestCount; i++) {\r\n            requests[i] = clientAllocationRequestMap[i];\r\n        }\r\n        return requests;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getStorageProviderWhitelistRequests()\r\n        public\r\n        view\r\n        returns (SubsidyDaoTypes.StorageProviderWhitelistRequest[] memory)\r\n    {\r\n        SubsidyDaoTypes.StorageProviderWhitelistRequest[]\r\n            memory requests = new SubsidyDaoTypes.StorageProviderWhitelistRequest[](\r\n                storageProviderWhitelistRequestCount\r\n            );\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < storageProviderWhitelistRequestCount; i++) {\r\n            requests[i] = storageProviderWhitelistRequestMap[i];\r\n        }\r\n        return requests;\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0xb2ce67b593feb4341ab3fbad16edc47a15ddf2808b7076e43620aa3a964fde7f","license":"MIT"},"contracts/libraries/SafeTransferLib.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: AGPL-3.0-only\r\n\r\npragma solidity >=0.8.0;\r\n\r\n/**\r\n * Slightly modified Solmate SafeTransferLib library for safe transfers of tokens\r\n * original ERC20 token has been replaced by Filecoin-safe ERC20. Updated token version performs\r\n * address normalization and allows to send tokens to f0/f1/f3/f4 addresses. In FVM no\r\n * tokens could be sent to the native actors.\r\n */\r\n\r\nimport {ERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol\";\r\n\r\n/// @notice Safe ETH and ERC20 transfer library that gracefully handles missing return values.\r\n/// @author Solmate (https://github.com/transmissions11/solmate/blob/main/src/utils/SafeTransferLib.sol)\r\n/// @dev Use with caution! Some functions in this library knowingly create dirty bits at the destination of the free memory pointer.\r\n/// @dev Note that none of the functions in this library check that a token has code at all! That responsibility is delegated to the caller.\r\nlibrary SafeTransferLib {\r\n    /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\r\n                             ETH OPERATIONS\r\n    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\r\n\r\n    function safeTransferETH(address to, uint256 amount) internal {\r\n        bool success;\r\n\r\n        /// @solidity memory-safe-assembly\r\n        assembly {\r\n            // Transfer the ETH and store if it succeeded or not.\r\n            success := call(gas(), to, amount, 0, 0, 0, 0)\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        require(success, \"ETH_TRANSFER_FAILED\");\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\r\n                            ERC20 OPERATIONS\r\n    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\r\n\r\n    function safeTransferFrom(ERC20 token, address from, address to, uint256 amount) internal {\r\n        bool success;\r\n\r\n        /// @solidity memory-safe-assembly\r\n        assembly {\r\n            // Get a pointer to some free memory.\r\n            let freeMemoryPointer := mload(0x40)\r\n\r\n            // Write the abi-encoded calldata into memory, beginning with the function selector.\r\n            mstore(\r\n                freeMemoryPointer,\r\n                0x23b872dd00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000\r\n            )\r\n            mstore(add(freeMemoryPointer, 4), from) // Append the \"from\" argument.\r\n            mstore(add(freeMemoryPointer, 36), to) // Append the \"to\" argument.\r\n            mstore(add(freeMemoryPointer, 68), amount) // Append the \"amount\" argument.\r\n\r\n            success := and(\r\n                // Set success to whether the call reverted, if not we check it either\r\n                // returned exactly 1 (can't just be non-zero data), or had no return data.\r\n                or(and(eq(mload(0), 1), gt(returndatasize(), 31)), iszero(returndatasize())),\r\n                // We use 100 because the length of our calldata totals up like so: 4 + 32 * 3.\r\n                // We use 0 and 32 to copy up to 32 bytes of return data into the scratch space.\r\n                // Counterintuitively, this call must be positioned second to the or() call in the\r\n                // surrounding and() call or else returndatasize() will be zero during the computation.\r\n                call(gas(), token, 0, freeMemoryPointer, 100, 0, 32)\r\n            )\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        require(success, \"TRANSFER_FROM_FAILED\");\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function safeTransfer(ERC20 token, address to, uint256 amount) internal {\r\n        bool success;\r\n\r\n        /// @solidity memory-safe-assembly\r\n        assembly {\r\n            // Get a pointer to some free memory.\r\n            let freeMemoryPointer := mload(0x40)\r\n\r\n            // Write the abi-encoded calldata into memory, beginning with the function selector.\r\n            mstore(\r\n                freeMemoryPointer,\r\n                0xa9059cbb00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000\r\n            )\r\n            mstore(add(freeMemoryPointer, 4), to) // Append the \"to\" argument.\r\n            mstore(add(freeMemoryPointer, 36), amount) // Append the \"amount\" argument.\r\n\r\n            success := and(\r\n                // Set success to whether the call reverted, if not we check it either\r\n                // returned exactly 1 (can't just be non-zero data), or had no return data.\r\n                or(and(eq(mload(0), 1), gt(returndatasize(), 31)), iszero(returndatasize())),\r\n                // We use 68 because the length of our calldata totals up like so: 4 + 32 * 2.\r\n                // We use 0 and 32 to copy up to 32 bytes of return data into the scratch space.\r\n                // Counterintuitively, this call must be positioned second to the or() call in the\r\n                // surrounding and() call or else returndatasize() will be zero during the computation.\r\n                call(gas(), token, 0, freeMemoryPointer, 68, 0, 32)\r\n            )\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        require(success, \"TRANSFER_FAILED\");\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function safeApprove(ERC20 token, address to, uint256 amount) internal {\r\n        bool success;\r\n\r\n        /// @solidity memory-safe-assembly\r\n        assembly {\r\n            // Get a pointer to some free memory.\r\n            let freeMemoryPointer := mload(0x40)\r\n\r\n            // Write the abi-encoded calldata into memory, beginning with the function selector.\r\n            mstore(\r\n                freeMemoryPointer,\r\n                0x095ea7b300000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000\r\n            )\r\n            mstore(add(freeMemoryPointer, 4), to) // Append the \"to\" argument.\r\n            mstore(add(freeMemoryPointer, 36), amount) // Append the \"amount\" argument.\r\n\r\n            success := and(\r\n                // Set success to whether the call reverted, if not we check it either\r\n                // returned exactly 1 (can't just be non-zero data), or had no return data.\r\n                or(and(eq(mload(0), 1), gt(returndatasize(), 31)), iszero(returndatasize())),\r\n                // We use 68 because the length of our calldata totals up like so: 4 + 32 * 2.\r\n                // We use 0 and 32 to copy up to 32 bytes of return data into the scratch space.\r\n                // Counterintuitively, this call must be positioned second to the or() call in the\r\n                // surrounding and() call or else returndatasize() will be zero during the computation.\r\n                call(gas(), token, 0, freeMemoryPointer, 68, 0, 32)\r\n            )\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        require(success, \"APPROVE_FAILED\");\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x312fc581df8ce86ba8aa99ea72920458ea774cc7058bb71452ab4b3ae3eb002e","license":"AGPL-3.0-only"},"contracts/libraries/tokens/IWFIL.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity >=0.8.0;\r\n\r\nimport {IERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol\";\r\nimport {WFIL} from \"fevmate/contracts/token/WFIL.sol\";\r\n\r\ninterface IWFIL is IERC20 {\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Deposit Fil into the contract, and mint WFIL 1:1.\r\n     */\r\n    function deposit() external payable;\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Burns _amount WFIL from caller's balance, and transfers them\r\n     * the unwrapped Fil 1:1.\r\n     *\r\n     * Note: The fund transfer used here is address.call{value: _amount}(\"\"),\r\n     * which does NOT work with the FVM's builtin Multisig actor. This is\r\n     * because, under the hood, address.call acts like a message to an actor's\r\n     * InvokeEVM method. The Multisig actor does not implement this method.\r\n     *\r\n     * This is a known issue, but we've decided to keep the method as-is,\r\n     * because it's likely that the Multisig actor is eventually upgraded to\r\n     * support this method. Even though a Multisig actor cannot directly\r\n     * withdraw, it is still possible for Multisigs to deposit, transfer,\r\n     * etc WFIL. So, if your Multisig actor needs to withdraw, you can\r\n     * transfer your WFIL to another contract, which can perform the\r\n     * withdrawal for you.\r\n     *\r\n     * (Though Multisig actors are not supported, BLS/SECPK/EthAccounts\r\n     * and EVM contracts can use this method normally)\r\n     */\r\n    function withdraw(uint256 amount) external;\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x59edbe83eb679b3557b83d4c6a1cd93284ff106fcee4f6278a94197140274684","license":"MIT"},"contracts/types/ClientTypes.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\n\r\n/**\r\n * @title Client account types for Solidity\r\n */\r\nlibrary ClientTypes {\r\n    struct Client {\r\n        bool verified;\r\n        string verificationFormCID;\r\n        bool blacklisted;\r\n        address ethAddress;\r\n        string name;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    struct ClientAllocation {\r\n        uint256 allocation; // Current subsidy token allocation left\r\n        uint256 allocationLimit; // Subsidy token allocation\r\n        uint256 dailyAllocation; // daily subsidy allocation for Clients\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    struct AllocationRequest {\r\n        uint256 allocationLimit; // Subsidy token allocation\r\n        uint256 dailyAllocation; // daily allocation in subsidy tokens\r\n        uint256 oneTimeAllocation; // one time allocation in subsidy tokens\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x4b9044f2f3cfb240dffc390d91d6cb6198aa53fe8ea86841f63186b460824b1e","license":"MIT"},"contracts/types/RetrievalRoyaltyTypes.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier:
